activities: ROAR is a global market research company.  Our mission is to help businesses understand and visualize the desires and behaviors of their customers for the purpose of creating a better experience for all.  The personal data that we collect is survey data, based on an expressed interest in or purchase of a particular automobile or automotive service.  We visualize survey response data in aggregate form, providing a voice to these customers.
personaldata: Personal data processed includes customer and visitor survey and contact information, provided solely on a voluntary basis.
privacyprograms: ROAR, LLC self-certifies Safe Harbor by making the enclosed representations to the Department of Commerce and other interested parties.
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor: http://www.bbb.org/us/european-dispute-resolution
